name: Griviel - Gems Of Orene
description:
After a long time of exploring and adventuring the region, you've finally found the secret area of Orene. Collect all the gems by exploring the area and jumping up on rocks to other rocks. After collecting all 30 gems, find you way back home.

This game is about a few minutes long. About 5 - 20 minutes long (may be longer). It is just a simple adventure game with parkour in it.

this is my second game ever published and finished. This game took me about 5 weeks to create. The game is made in Unity and all the models are made by me in Blender. I love the low poly art style of games and also love the adventure genre!

Please play and share with friends!

I would really appreciate it if you would take time to look at my Youtube channel and website.

My Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCF8okABExHnewNbVg...

My Website: http://snaielstudios.weebly.com/

Controls:

Mouse to look around

WASD to walk

LEFT SHIFT to sprint

SPACE to jump

ESC to pause
